goal.en: This course is the second semester of linear algebra. The focus of the teaching is to explore the properties of eigenvalues ​​and their applications. The ultimate goal is of course related to solving linear equations, and its applications include the classification of curves or surfaces in geometry and calculus. Maximum and minimum values ​​of the function.
goal.ch: 本門課是線性代數的第二學期，授課重點在探討特徵值的性質及其應用，最終的目的當然是和解線性方程組有關，其應用則及於幾何上曲線或曲面的分類及微積分中函數的極大值、極小值。
